= Introduction =

How to use the Grails template for the ALA. The template by default gives:

 * Styling & default layout (header/footer)
 * CAS integration

== Steps to use this template == 

 # Checkout: 
{{{
svn co http://ala.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/getstarted  insert-project-name-here
}}}
 # Detach:   cd to insert-project-name-here and run 
{{{
rm -rf find .-type d -name ".svn"
}}}
 # Code!


== Things you'll want to change == 

=== /application.properties ===

{{{ app.name=getstarted }}}

=== Config.groovy ===

 * environments

{{{ 

environments {
    development {
        grails.logging.jul.usebridge = true
        grails.serverURL = 'http://localhost:8080/' + appName
    }
    production {
        grails.logging.jul.usebridge = false
        // TODO: grails.serverURL = "http://www.changeme.com"
        grails.serverURL = 'http://localhost:8080/' + appName
    }
}

}}}
